page.title: 16Attitudes survey
page.content: 18 childen in the class took the following questions home of which 14 returned their sheets. 1.What do you like best about living where you do? 2.What do you like least about living where you do? 3.Were you born here?Were your parents born here? 4.If you where not born here where have you come from and how long have you lived here? 5.If you could improve or change any on thing in this area what would it be? 6.Any other comments you wish to make? The children were asked to take these home and to discuss them with their family before filling them in.
